Question 29) At the end of the twentieth century and because of the advances of science, a system was produced by information techniques, which began to play a role of link between the others, uniting them and ensuring the new system a planetary presence . A market that uses this system of advanced techniques results in this perverse globalization.
One consequence for the productive sector and another for the world of work coming from the transformations cited in the text are present, respectively, in:
A) elimination of localational advantages and expansion of labor legislation.
B) Limitation of logistics flows and strengthening union associations.
C) Decreased industrial investments and devaluation of qualified posts.
D) concentration of manufacturing areas and reduction of weekly journey.
E) automation of manufacturing processes and increased unemployment levels.
